website_summaries.verdict: A set of 4 trigger locks at a decent price that allows you to work with a combination so you never have to worry about finding the right key.
pros: Trigger lock renders the gun unusable
Fits on a lot of different types of guns, pistols, and rifles
cons: The dial can be a little tricky to click into place
There are some reliability problems with the product on arrival
Some of the locks might not work

customer_reviews.title: Work reasonably well
customer_reviews.text: These work as intended and are easy enough to use. Rotation of the dial(s) can be a bit finicky, but it wasn't so bad that I was discouraged from using them. Something went wrong with one of the locks; the combination was reset from the default, but it didn't seem to take the combination I provided. Fortunately, I only needed three, and setup of the other three went fine. If I want to use the fourth, though, I'm going to have to take the time to guess the combination -- I tried all the variants which were just a digit off each way of my intended combination, but none of those worked.
customer_reviews.author: Tom FordTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Almost all good
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 4 locks worked fine, the 4th would not accept a new combination. The 3rd digit wheel would not move when the reset button was depressed.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Top quality trigger locks at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Products arrived very quickly and work well. These are good quality locks with the look and feel of higher priced brands. I would buy these locks again.
customer_reviews.author: DHA

customer_reviews.title: Setting the combos isn't rocket science, but the numbers ...
customer_reviews.text: Setting the combos isn't rocket science, but the numbers are hard to turn. May just take some breaking in, but the initial use was a little rough.
customer_reviews.author: Lane N. Halterman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I hate worrying about losing keys. I use these on three handguns and a shotgun. They fit well on everything but the HK handgun.
customer_reviews.author: Pat T

customer_reviews.title: 3 of 4 good
customer_reviews.text: 3 of 4 worked fine. 4th wouldn’t take new combination. Really need 4, so now have to ship another but the price is ok and safety is important so will get another but dang it.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Frank Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No one has shot themselves with my gun so...five stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK wont keep out Alexander Mundy but keeps the kids out!
customer_reviews.author: Aberserker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought eight of them and using six right now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice locks they fit all my rifles with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Nice locks they fit all my rifles with no problem , and very easy to set and change the combos
customer_reviews.author: Benhappy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Will be buying more when I acquire more guns.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gray

customer_reviews.title: Sucks dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Used for a rifle broke off with a flat head screwdriver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 4 didn't open with preset combo
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 4 locks wouldn't open with the default 0-0-0 combination. The other two were fine, but 50% bad stock just sucks. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Justinius

customer_reviews.title: and it seems to be fine. It is a deterrent for grandkids and others
customer_reviews.text: I am on vacation for a while, and haven't used them yet, but I did operate one of them, and it seems to be fine. It is a deterrent for grandkids and others.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kettle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit 3 of my husband's Ruger guns or his Winchester 12 gage. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Power

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: nice trigger lock for my browing 3006 rifle : )
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good price but mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price but mediocre quality. I bought 20. 3 of them not usable because the tumblers won't rotate
customer_reviews.author: LS Review

product_meta.title: RioRand 3-Digit Combination Gun Lock Fits Pistols, Rifles, Shotguns (Pack of 4)
feature_bullets: Set-your-own password combination Gun Trigger Lock. Resettable combination locking mechanisms for keyless convenience. Easy to set & reset.
Features positive locking with adjustable ratchet mechanism. Easy to attach and lock.
Durable Material Construction Positive locking with adjustable ratchet mechanism. Protective rubber pads shield can protect gun finish from scratching
Cushioned rubber pads protect gun's finish from marring or scratching
The RioRand Gun Trigger Lock fits many handguns, rifles and shotguns
